name: Last Rites 1347
description:
1347 The Black Death ravages Europe. The End of the world draws near as The Pestilence brings about supernatural events. A man seeks comfort and forgiveness in his final hours.

This game has some fantasy horror themes as well as some semi fictional religious themes.

Used some tree assets from Elegant Crow and I give him full credit for some great retro models!

Supports Windows 2000 to win 11 32bit

32bit intel mac and PPC no Catalina and higher support (64 bit)
